title: Pure Water Machine Operator
description: Responsibilities: 1. Carrying out regular production and packaging of sachet water. 2. Clean up machine parts after every work procedure. 3. Test the machine before main work begins to be sure that it is in good condition for production. 4. Monitors machine closely to detect any signs of malfunctioning that may affect the quality of work and tackles it immediately to avoid it getting worse. 5. Ensuring that the machine is operating at its optimum capacity. 6. Ability to read and understand machine manuals. Qualification / Experience; Minimum of OND. Minimum of two (2) years experience in operating Sachet Water Machine Ability to work well as a team member Smart & be able to multi-task. Salary: 45,000.00 - 60,000.00 per month Ability to commute/relocate: - Benin City: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (preferred)
